Hmn, Yes port hope would be good you'll make around 20 - 25k exp/hr if your alone there.
Most 2nd floor tombs would be good if you don't mind using hmms on stalkers.
Also maybe you could try scarabs with GS it might be a bit of a waste but if the other places are full you can easily find a scarab cave.
Carrion worms are good to make cash if you need to repay for runes and you'll get Average 20k an hr.

Well if your using sov then you could try any tomb and it will make a profit.
Port hope is always good exp if you can find it not packed with noobs.
And with your EQ scarabs would probably be ok at your level.
And in a few more skill levels and maybe level 60 you could probably bot 2nd or 3rd or all floors of Cyclopsis if you can get them free.

Tombs with lootbags `till lvl 40 or so, then just like Aztan.


* Level 110+
* Vocation EK
* Skills/Magic level 95/95+
* Number of runes you can use many
* EQ fullrare (sca)
* Wolrd type normal

Curious to know where I'm recomended to bot.

Well, let me give you a little tip :)
Go to orc fort. Make your own script that loots as well (find a nice place to stash the loot).
You should be making around 50-60k per h if the script is well made.

Also, tombs are great (you should use exura and mfs mostly).
You can do thornbacks as well with ~40-45k per h.


What do you think are best places for 30-40 knight on facc
skills 60/60-70/70, 4-5mlvl, set average: g-arm, k-legs, w-helmet, medusa shield, skull staff/wh, WOrld is NON-PVP
I would suppose:
-soldiers + dwarfs[when no crowded]
-maybe venore rots

-DARK CATHEDRAL \/
Can you tell me how to hunt there with such a knight??What set to loot and which floors...
And if u know some other nice places.

Soldiers and the elf place near venore (you can make up to 22k per h there).
Don't realy know anything about the Dark Cathedral.

Glad to help.

Yours,
Blink

04-04-2007, 12:46
Well, let me give you a little tip :)
Go to orc fort. Make your own script that loots as well (find a nice place to stash the loot).
You should be making around 50-60k per h if the script is well made.

Also, tombs are great (you should use exura and mfs mostly).
You can do thornbacks as well with ~40-45k per h.

Glad to help.

Depends what you're looking for.
For cash, go to soldiers
For exp go to elf city
If I were you, I would chose from 2 options
- Bot a druid to 27, summon me a monk and train to 85.85, then simply do guards. Should be making around 30k/h + good gps.
- OR keep hunting soldiers for a while (own script, loot all that can be sold) untill I could afford a p-acc with in-game money. Then it gets easyer.

Sephius
04-07-2007, 03:04
As requested, I'll answer the mages.

If free account.

8-20 dwarves/gobils. You can find the scripts on the forum.
20-30 venore rots. You can find the scripts on the forum.
Now buy a p-acc

If premium.

8-20 darashia rots. You can find the scripts on the forum.
20-30 tombs to make some cash. You can find the scripts on the forum.
30-50 larvas. You can find the scripts on the forum.
Now wait for the vis script.


That's all folks.
Sephius

swamp trolls/Venore rots/fibula/dwarfs - big NO.
Shitload of pks there, so he won't be able to afk much.

I think you should do open field such as port hope crocs and shit.
You won't get much exp, but you can be fully afk since the chances of geting killed on a "open field" are preaty slim. - ALWAYS with very friendly on-.

Yours,
Blink

05-24-2007, 17:38
63 Knight
Skills 75/78 magic 6
A lot of runes + mana fluids

Rh, dsm, fire-axe, mastermind shield, golden legs, boh/steel, dragon lance.
Take your dragon lance and bot the 2nd turtle island (middle one). Bring like 3 bp uhs. At the end of the day (8h~) you've probably earned 10-20k cash and 240k~ exp. It all depends on the spawn time in your world.

Ilyustar
Larvas are not best for me...If you haven't got k-set they may hit you rly hard and about 20 sorc i had to wear some mfs + exura gran 0o. Pluses are that you have always food there + about 8-12k/h exp and some cash. I would reccomend N-W hidden one [south from gs tomb entrance ~~]
I think that You should try Port-Hope at ur world... when its good-popullated and no-one there like i've already told up to 12k/h.
Otherwise most west rotworms darashia are nice with gold depositer....I think about 8k/h .
nivim
I have my scripts for venore rotworm-big-cave + orcs cave/with shaman resp/or without + gold depositer: )
I was getting the same knight [but a bit better eq/skull staff medusa shield] at non-pvp 6-9k/h [what a magic number : o] + about 1k/h cash.
You may try also some dark cathedral only near entrance script... but it would may be a risk of lureing sth on you.
Good choice is also fibula rotworms [also risk of lurels] and tons of cash.
Nice are also dwarf mines [b careful for reporting evul "skillers" whose dwarfs u kill all the time]: D

* Level: 25
* Vocation: Elite knght

Keep boting there until level 50~, get 75/75+ then go tortoises.

Go thalas tomb,ill come back with an edit including a script.
Duno if its working properly,credits to syntaxe.


onGMpause
setVeryFriendly
setPriority stalker:+6
setPriority scorpion:+5
setPriority slime:+4
setPriority mummy:+3
setPriority ghoul:+2
setExoriVis stalker
setExoriVis crypt shambler
setExoriVis mummy
setExoriVis slime
setExoriVis scorpion
setExoriVis scarab
setMeleeKill cobra
setMeleeKill poison spider
setMeleeKill skeleton
setMeleeKill hyaena
setMeleeKill larva
setExoriVis ghoul
setLoot 1A 17
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot EC 0B
setLoot E2 0B
setLoot D3 0B
setLoot D8 0B
setLoot D9 0B
setLoot E9 0B
setLoot 1A 17
setLoot 15 17
setLoot 19 17
setLoot 18 17
setLoot 17 17
setLoot 16 17
setLoot 1F 0D
setLoot 27 0D
move 33354,32742,12
move 33336,32742,12
move 33337,32753,12
move 33336,32733,12
move 33331,32723,12
move 33339,32716,12
move 33331,32713,12
move 33332,32724,12
move 33343,32742,12
move 33369,32710,12
move 33383,32713,12
move 33384,32703,12
resetLoot
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot E2 0B
setLoot D3 0B
setLoot D8 0B
setLoot D9 0B
setLoot E9 0B
setLoot 1A 17
setLoot 15 17
setLoot 19 17
setLoot 18 17
setLoot 17 17
setLoot 16 17
setLoot 1F 0D
setLoot 27 0D
dropLootOnGround 33384,32701,12
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot EC 0B
setLoot E2 0B
setLoot D3 0B
setLoot D8 0B
setLoot D9 0B
setLoot E9 0B
setLoot 1A 17
setLoot 15 17
setLoot 19 17
setLoot 18 17
setLoot 17 17
setLoot 16 17
setLoot 1F 0D
setLoot 27 0D
move 33369,32723,12
move 33385,32727,12
move 33394,32722,12
move 33387,32735,12
move 33396,32741,12
move 33392,32755,12
move 33357,32754,12
move 33349,32770,12
move 33364,32771,12
move 33378,32776,12
move 33360,32772,12
move 33356,32787,12
move 33343,32780,12
move 33349,32766,12
move 33355,32742,12
resetKill
onGMpause
setVeryFriendly
setExoriVis stalker
setPriority stalker:+6
setPriority scorpion:+5
setPriority slime:+4
setPriority mummy:+3
setPriority ghoul:+2
setExoriVis crypt shambler
setMeleeKill cobra
setExoriVis mummy
setExoriVis slime
setExoriVis scorpion
setExoriVis scarab
setMeleeKill poison spider
setMeleeKill skeleton
setMeleeKill hyaena
setMeleeKill larva
setMeleeKill ghoul
#changes to full atk
waitX 3
sayMessage exiva > A0 01 00 00
move 33355,32740,11
move 33364,32734,11
move 33355,32726,11
move 33338,32727,11
move 33343,32715,11
move 33341,32704,11

#changes to full def
waitX 3
sayMessage exiva > A0 03 00 00
move 33355,32742,12
resetKill
gotoScriptLine 0

Kala
01-06-2008, 17:04
91 ek, non pvp,rare set, justice seeker/avenger 80/76.

Where should I bot to get 50k/h+ always and almost don't waste? please instead of saying barbarians/orc fortress or whatever, could you tell me what script to use?

And do you know any better place to get money than laguna isles? I get there 35k/h exp btw. Thanks!

Frost Giants?

U have great profit there, and about 55k-60k exp/h

here u got the script:

onGMpause
#by Fran
setMeleeKill frost giant
setMeleeKill mammoth
setMeleeKill frost giantess
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot C5 0C
setLoot 11 1D
setLoot 7A 1C
move 32415,31246,6
move 32415,31244,6
move 32415,31242,5

You can try hunt with royal spears at port hope turtles.

Here is a script.


onGMpause
setLoot 0B 17
setLoot E4 0D
setLoot 2E 16
setLoot CF 0C
setLoot D7 0B
setMeleeKill tortoise
setMeleeKill Carrion Worm
setMeleeKill Blood Crab
setMeleeKill Crocodile
setMeleeKill Swamp Troll
setMeleeKill Slime
move 32641,32716,10
move 32579,32725,10

Port hope north

here is a script
onGMpause
setMeleeKill slime
setMeleeKill terror bird
setMeleeKill cobra
setMeleeKill crocodile
setMeleeKill centipede
setMeleeKill swamp troll
setMeleeKill cave rat
setMeleeKill snake
setLoot D7 0B
move 32599,32708,7
move 32587,32704,7
move 32577,32701,7
move 32574,32687,7
move 32595,32676,7
move 32611,32684,7
move 32639,32652,7
move 32645,32666,7
move 32643,32635,7

Sunshine
01-28-2008, 21:06
got some script for that?

Ice witches + barbarians


onGMpause
setMeleeKill Ice Witch
setMeleeKill War Wolf
setMeleeKill Barbarian Bloodwalker
setMeleeKill Barbarian Brutetamer
setMeleeKill Barbarian Headsplitter
setMeleeKill Barbarian Skullhunter
setPriority Barbarian Bloodwalker:+1
setPriority Barbarian Brutetamer:+2
setPriority War Wolf:-1
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot DB 1C
setLoot F6 0D
setLoot 7A 1C
setLoot 17 17
setLoot 27 1D
setLoot 19 17
setLoot EC 0B
#chain armor
setLoot 1E 0D
#battle axe
setLoot C2 0C
#halberd
setLoot C5 0C
#ice cube
setLoot 11 1D
move 32031,31444,6
move 32023,31442,6
move 32024,31442,5
move 32023,31442,4
move 32021,31446,4
sayMessage exiva > 68
move 32274,31024,7
resetLoot
setLoot 1E 0D
dropLootOnGround 32274,31023,7
resetLoot
setLoot C2 0C
dropLootOnGround 32273,31023,7
resetLoot
setLoot C5 0C
dropLootOnGround 32272,31023,7
resetLoot
setLoot 11 1D
dropLootOnGround 32271,31023,7
resetLoot
setLoot D7 0B
dropLootOnGround 32270,31023,7
resetLoot
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot DB 1C
setLoot F6 0D
setLoot 7A 1C
setLoot 17 17
setLoot 27 1D
setLoot 19 17
setLoot EC 0B
#chain armor
setLoot 1E 0D
#battle axe
setLoot C2 0C
#halberd
setLoot C5 0C
#ice cube
setLoot 11 1D
#spear pickup
waitX 3
move 32268,31023,7
move 32265,31025,7
#sayMessage exiva > 68
move 32022,31444,4
move 32023,31442,3
move 32024,31442,2
move 32024,31442,1
move 32024,31441,2
move 32022,31441,3
move 32024,31441,4
move 32022,31441,5
move 32024,31442,6

02-13-2008, 17:13
Somebody know?

Port Hope north :)

Theres about 22+ k exp/h

heres script


onGMpause
setMeleeKill cobra
setMeleeKill crocodile
setMeleeKill centipede
setMeleeKill swamp troll
setMeleeKill cave rat
setMeleeKill snake
setSpellKill slime,exori flam,3
setSpellKill terror bird,exori vis,2
setPriority slime:+1
setPriority terror bird:+2
setLoot D7 0B
move 32599,32708,7
move 32587,32704,7
move 32577,32701,7
move 32574,32687,7
move 32595,32676,7
move 32611,32684,7
move 32639,32652,7
move 32645,32666,7
move 32643,32635,7
move 32627,32617,7
move 32653,32618,7
move 32642,32601,7
move 32674,32609,7
move 32695,32600,7
move 32710,32587,7
move 32704,32618,7

gotoScriptLine 0

04-21-2008, 21:14
Can anyone help me with botting.I'm new here !

Lvl 128ek
Skills : 84/80
Eq : full rare set
Pacc.

Can anyone suggest me any script , please!


:start
setPriority dragon:+1
setMeleeKill dragon
setAvoidFront dragon
setMeleeKill Dragon Hatchling
setAvoidFront Dragon Hatchling
setFollow
resetLoot
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot 06 1D
setLoot D6 0C
setLoot D7 0B
setLoot 17 0D
setLoot 20 17
setLoot 81 19
setLoot 79 0D

Taezzar
08-25-2008, 07:07
RP 50+lvl
78/60
Pally armor Vampire Shield Aol Boots of haste Blue Legs Royal Helmet

2-5BP SMP.
Looking for place to took 40-50k/h. Can be lil waste :>

Goroma - Bonebeasts Island (including the GS).
Plains of Havoc (PoH) - Dragons + DLs, Giant Spiders, Temple Area, Orcs.
Drefia (Darashia) - Necromancers.


For Goroma, I highly recommend you to use enchanted spears at your level. Try to avoid water elemental spawns, since they do not give good exp and they make you waste! I'd advice you to run around the bushes at the sides of the island. Bring mana pots and heal with exura. In case of extreme luring, try to lure just a few to the bushes. If that's not possible, run to the stairs and use a script with hold target. This place should give you at least 50k/h exp. The loot is fine, I'm not sure if you're going to profit at your level. Also bring an obsidian knife with you to get Hardened Bones.

Plains of Havoc is not a hard place. You just have to get used to the spawn times of the Giant Spiders and the DLs. You run around killing every creature you can find. Also rope up the GS from the hole to the south of temple. For the dragons + DLs hole, try using a hold target script while stairhopping (for DL). Heal with mana pots and exura. Remember to use haste when a GS is too fast! PoH generally gives you some profit and around 40-60k/h.

As for Drefia, I strongly suggest to use Enchanted Spears (you can also use Royal Spears, but you will have to run after the Necromancer). What I do is heal with mana pots and exura, and I run all spawns (the one to the north and two to the south), while killing all demon skeletons. Trap the ghosts in the northeast room, where the black sheeps are. This place is sometimes profit and sometimes waste, there're chances of looting Boots of Haste, Skull Staff, Noble Axe and Mystic Turbans (which can be traded for blue piece of cloth). Around 60k/h exp.


Peace.
zkaningen

10-15-2008, 17:28
140 mage, vdl is to risky atm and bonebeast island -2 is a pain getting to and from so I need a new place. I can make the script myself but I generally need som ideas on where to bot.

Also, it's a pretty low populated server, around 600 at peek hours. For example, if I start botting bonebeast island -2 around 10:00 (1 hour after ss) my exp will be around 90k/h for a few hours then rise. If I start botting at a good hour my exp will be steady at 130k/h. It's almost the same with vdl (100-130 variety). So for me it's even harder finding decent places as spawns aren't great.

Do I care about profitting?
No, money isn't really a problem, but I've hunted manually the last 100 levels basically and everyone needs a break now and then.

What I want is:
100k/h exp, ATLEAST. I find bb-2 and vdl pretty good so if it's around 90k/h at low spawntimes and 100k+ at better that's fine too.

I really hope someone can tell me some potential places, you don't even have to test them, the main point is that they sound as they have potential for decent exp. I'll of course, release the script once I made it and it delivers the promised exp/h.

Thanks in advance.

If u can hunt blue djinns go there -1, can easily make 150k a day + you will use alot of manas im level 135 and I take 400 but I always come back with 10k+ gold, 10-25 small spahires , 1-5 iron ores (from golems) , 5-10 blue cloths , 0-3 mystic turban. You wont need to take to many royals as djinns do drop them and its not that rare either.

-2 is also a nice place though I would not recommend botting there it can get really extreme when you have 2 djiins , 2 fire element and a marid on screen.

Lvl 51

Facc
Need script to get really big amount of money, cos' I don't rly care about exp. I just have to buy pacc so I need money.

Use the search function
<use the Advance one>

write user name: Fhs_d_h
Key words: Personal Scripts

You will see in my thread a script called "Undead Garden"
its located 1 floor above the EXP gate to enter PoI DLs :)
just bring 2 Destroy fields,rope,shovel,food.
all you'll need to do is to rope up 2-4 Demon skeletons up 1 floor so u can bot in a spot full of ghouls which will get u tons of gps:D
Well i would suggest u to use a normal wep like a sword or axe and not spears in this cave so u can have alot of cap

note that u cannot stay too afk with this script cause ppl could rope u up and lure GS on u then >.<
also u'll be needing to go depositting alone as its near PoH after all :p

10-26-2009, 10:24
Level: 23
Vocation : Knight (Free Account)
Skills/Magic level: Skills 55/55
Number of runes you can use : I can't
EQ: Dark Helmet, Scale armor, plate legs, dwarven shield, jagged sword.
Wolrd type: Normal pvp
Here is script for dwarf caves near kazordoon with depositer in carlin if more than 1000GP. This is my first script made in 2008 i think ;P(100% By me ;D)
-1 Floor mines (dwarfs,rots)
Average session speed:
5904 exp/h


setFriendly
setFollow
setLoot D7 0B
waitX 3
setLoot 8B 0E
setMeleeKill dwarf
setMeleeKill poison spider
setMeleeKill bat
setMeleeKill goblin
setMeleeKill snake
setMeleeKill spider
setMeleeKill wolf
setMeleeKill bear
setMeleeKill rotworm
setPriority rotworm:+1
#Gogo mines
move 32348,31789,7
IfEnoughItemsGoto D7 0B,1000,66
move 32354,31789,7
move 32377,31789,7
move 32398,31784,7
move 32402,31759,7
move 32425,31748,7
move 32453,31757,7

This is always taken.

Edit: I haven't played this game since version 7.6 or so. Therefore I have no idea about how these new mysterious islands are, what new monsters I have to encounter, and if a small butterfly would be able to one-hit me. I have no idea about the new Tibia.

I've been thinking to hunt (well, bot) in places like Scarabs, deeper tombs, dragons (when/if empty), dwarf guards. Also I have 5 FACC knights producing me a few 100k's per day so I will always have money for waste hunts with maximum exp/h. Though, I don't like the super wasting huntings.
